title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: The History of 21st-Century Educational Technology and Research: Up to the Pandemic

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational technology concepts and understanding of pre-20th-century educational history
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will be able to analyze and chronologically describe 10 major developments in educational technology since 2000
Learners will be able to select five key educational events during the digital transformation period and evaluate their impact on educational settings
Learners will be able to compare and contrast at least three cases of educational technology innovations that emerged during the COVID-19 pandemic
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
